title: Craved
description: Daniella Walker was a normal culinary student living a normal life until the Prophets pulled her name out of their magic hat. They forced her blindly toward what they insisted was her destiny. A month later, bloody and broken, she regains consciousness in the Magic Intensive Care Unit in Chicago. Trapped and helpless with wounds modern medicine canâ€™t mend, a newfound hatred for all things magical boils over. But when two handsome brothers break into her hospital room, heal her, and take her to a hidden safe house for Magi, Dani is plunged into the very world she was determined to despise. Forced to confront the terrible things that happened to her, Dani must face the magic she hates and realize her own abilities before she puts the people who saved her and have become trusted allies in danger.
author: Jaye A. Jones
